title: Sensational Alex Harvey Band-Live at the BBC

TSAHB had only released one album, Framed, when they went into the BBCÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Paris Theatre to record their first In Concert performance in 1972.
